name: rakr-widget
description: Widget enabling Rakr integration in any site.

scripts.build: tsc -p src/ || cp src/lib/*.html build || true
scripts.dist: mkdir dist && browserify -t [ stringify --extensions [.html] ] build/rakr.js > dist/rakr.js && uglifyjs dist/rakr.js -o dist/rakr.min.js
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf src/typings && rimraf build && rimraf dist

author: Chunghwa Telecom Co., Ltd.
